Hello LowEndTalk Users

Securebit AG is a member of RIPE NCC (Réseaux IP Européens Network Coordination Centre). RIPE NCC is responsible for the allocation and assignment of Autonomous System Numbers (ASN) and IP addresses in Europe. As LIR (Local Internet Registry), we offer them at attractive conditions.

As our customer you can decide from which parent subnet you would like to receive your address space. Our system will assign you the next free IPv6 address space within a few seconds and register it for you in the RIPE database.
[View all Offers and more Details](https://www.securebit.ch/internet/resources/ipv6)

**Today we want to offer you cheap IPv6 Prefixes**:
> **IPv6 Subnet /44 - CHF 15.00/annually ($16.90/annually) - [Order now](https://www.securebit.ch/order?id=a27)**
> - Choose parent Subnet (like 2a10:cc40::/29)
> - Assigned to your RIPE ORG Object
> - You can create Sub-Allocations, Routes and Domains (PTR) in RIPE DB
> - RPKI (ROA) via Webinterface
> - Webinterface (Securebit Cloud Manager)

[View all Offers and more Details](https://www.securebit.ch/internet/resources/ipv6)

![](https://cdn.4b42.com/images/website/InternetResourcesIPv6_44.png "")
